title: CoreWeave drops 14% on wider-than-expected loss ahead of lockup expiry
description: CoreWeave's stock dropped about 14% after the renter of artificial intelligence data centers reported a bigger-than-expected loss.
content:
CoreWeave 's stock dropped 14% after the renter of artificial intelligence data centers reported a bigger-than-expected loss.

title: Is AI going to steal your job? Not if you work in cleaning, construction or hospitality, Australian report finds
description: Jobs and Skills Australia says doomsday predictions are overblown but almost all occupations will be augmented by artificial intelligence
content:
Want an AI-proof job?
Rethink your plans to pursue a career in book keeping, marketing or programming and consider instead a job in nursing, construction or hospitality.
In a major new report, Jobs and Skills Australia modelled the potential impact o... [5075 chars]

title: AI breakthrough designs peptide drugs to target previously untreatable proteins
description: A study published in Nature Biotechnology reveals a powerful new use for artificial intelligence: designing small, drug-like molecules that can stick to and break down harmful proteins in the body - even when scientists don't know what those proteins look like.
content: A study published in Nature Biotechnology reveals a powerful new use for artificial intelligence: designing small, drug-like molecules that can stick to and break down harmful proteins in the body - even when scientists don't know what those proteins... [3900 chars]

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - RBI's AI Panel Urges Guardrails in Financial Tech
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact. No longer confined to the realm of science fiction, AI is now a driving force behind innovations across all sectors— from healthcare and finance to entertainment and manufacturing. Its impact is far-reaching, transforming industries, reshaping economies, and influencing the way we navigate daily life.

title: Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X or Grok among its top apps
description: Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.
content:
Billionaire SpaceX, Tesla and X owner Elon Musk says he plans to sue Apple for not featuring X and its Grok artificial intelligence chatbot app in its top recommended apps in its App Store.

title: The Downside of AI in Healthcare: Erosion of Medical Skills
description: A new study suggests that excessive reliance on artificial intelligence in healthcare may lead to skill degradation, as exemplified by a 20% decrease in experienced health professionals' ability to detect benign tumours during colonoscopies when not using AI. The research, first to highlight this issue, calls for more studies.
content: A recent study raises concerns over frequent reliance on artificial intelligence in healthcare, particularly as it relates to skill degradation among medical professionals. Researchers found a 20% drop in experienced clinicians' ability to identify b... [694 chars]

title: AI use in colonoscopy may weaken doctors' detection skills over time
description: The introduction of artificial intelligence (AI) to assist colonoscopies is linked to a reduction in the ability of endoscopists (health professionals who perform colonoscopies) to detect precancerous growths (adenomas) in the colon without AI assistance, according to a paper published in The Lancet Gastroenterology & Hepatology journal.
